data.text:
MAC peripheral dedicated test coverage — Current test_basic.asm only verifies that MAC doesn't interfere with CPU operation (bus contention fix). No tests exercise MAC-specific functionality: unsigned accumulate, signed accumulate, overflow detection, config register read/write, or accumulator ready signaling.

Need a dedicated test program (test_mac.asm) that writes to MAC registers via SW, triggers accumulation operations, and reads back results to verify correctness.
